activities: Kickbox collects some information from customers in order to establish a unique account for system access.  Information collected includes: first name, last name, organization name, email, and a password.  This information is collected at account registration to identify each user within the system in order to provide services and collect payments.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data covered does not include manually processed data
